revision.text:
Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # Update the [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]] # Update [[Speedruns]]. Get rid of all the categories that are not relevant, make it reflect the [https://www.speedrun.com/pokeclicker Speedrun.com] site. # Add the Dungeon Token formula(s) to [[Dungeon Tokens]] and/or [[Pokémon Statistics]] # Move [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] to its own page. Add a reference to it in the main [[Berries]] and [[Farm]] descriptions. Add an explanation of the wandering Rate (Base, Roseli, more plots = better odds, strategy for getting wanderers, etc.) # The [[Home Page]] is too cluttered with the staff on the right side, and it's really unnecessary to include everyone there. The Staff table on the right side of the page should be removed and placed on its own page (linked on the [[Home Page]]), with appropriate updated subsections for Developers + Retired Developers, Code Contributors, Wiki Moderators, Wiki Contributors, and Alpha Testers (Poke Crew). Wiki Moderators could be reincorporated to the [[Home Page]] near the bottom of the page. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # add Shiny Variants to the normal Pokémon and a way to swap between the images. This is something that's up to debate, as there's little use for it other than being something for us to do. == Completed tasks awaiting moderators ==

Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # Update the [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]] # Update [[Speedruns]]. Get rid of all the categories that are not relevant, make it reflect the [https://www.speedrun.com/pokeclicker Speedrun.com] site. # Link the Discord on [[Challenge Mode]]. Add a link to the A6CSRQ doc/google sheet under its own subcategory (it is popular) with an explanation # Add the Dungeon Token formula(s) to [[Dungeon Tokens]] and/or [[Pokémon Statistics]] # Move [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] to its own page. Add a reference to it in the main [[Berries]] and [[Farm]] descriptions. Add an explanation of the wandering Rate (Base, Roseli, more plots = better odds, strategy for getting wanderers, etc.) # The [[Home Page]] is too cluttered with the staff on the right side, and it's really unnecessary to include everyone there. The Staff table on the right side of the page should be removed and placed on its own page (linked on the [[Home Page]]), with appropriate updated subsections for Developers + Retired Developers, Code Contributors, Wiki Moderators, Wiki Contributors, and Alpha Testers (Poke Crew). Wiki Moderators could be reincorporated to the [[Home Page]] near the bottom of the page. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # add Shiny Variants to the normal Pokémon and a way to swap between the images. This is something that's up to debate, as there's little use for it other than being something for us to do. == Completed tasks awaiting moderators ==

Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # Update the [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]] # Update [[Speedruns]]. Get rid of all the categories that are not relevant, make it reflect the [https://www.speedrun.com/pokeclicker Speedrun.com] site. # Link the Discord on [[Challenge Mode]]. Add a link to the A6CSRQ doc/google sheet under its own subcategory (it is popular) with an explanation # Add the Dungeon Token formula(s) to [[Dungeon Tokens]] and/or [[Pokémon Statistics]] # Move [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] to its own page. Add a reference to it in the main [[Berries]] and [[Farm]] descriptions. Add an explanation of the wandering Rate (Base, Roseli, more plots = better odds, strategy for getting wanderes, etc.) # The [[Home Page]] is too cluttered with the staff on the right side, and it's really unnecessary to include everyone there. The Staff table on the right side of the page should be removed and placed on its own page (linked on the [[Home Page]]), with appropriate updated subsections for Developers + Retired Developers, Code Contributors, Wiki Moderators, Wiki Contributors, and Alpha Testers (Poke Crew). Wiki Moderators could be reincorporated to the [[Home Page]] near the bottom of the page. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # add Shiny Variants to the normal Pokémon and a way to swap between the images. This is something that's up to debate, as there's little use for it other than being something for us to do. == Completed tasks awaiting moderators ==

We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # Update the [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]] # Update [[Speedruns]]. This is something that's up to debate, as there's little use for it other than being something for us to do. == Completed tasks awaiting moderators ==
